metadata.description: Not used, but needed to pass arm-ttk test `Location-Should-Not-Be-Hardcoded`.  We instead use the `workspace-location` which is derived from the LA workspace
[concat('Region to deploy solution resources -- separate from location selection',parameters('location'))]
Workspace name for Log Analytics where Microsoft Sentinel is setup

properties.description: This rule creates an incident when more than certain number of Dnsniff events are generated from a host
properties.query: ForescoutHostProperties_CL | extend  d = parse_json(HostProperties) | where d.DnsniffEvent matches regex "DNS Query Type:.A;DNS Query/Response:.Query" | extend ipaddress = iif(isnotempty(Ipv4Addr), Ipv4Addr, (iif(isnotempty(Ipv6Addr), Ipv6Addr, ""))) | where isnotempty(ipaddress) and isnotempty(EmIpAddr) | summarize NumEvents_d =count() by ipaddress, EmIpAddr | where NumEvents_d > 2 | sort by NumEvents_d asc | project NumEvents_d, ipaddress, EmIpAddr

metadata.title: Forescout-DNS_Sniff_Event_Playbook
metadata.description: This playbook will update incident with action to perform on endpoint
metadata.prerequisites: Forescout Sentinel plugin is installed and running

properties.description: ForescoutHostPropertyMonitor data connector with template version 3.0.0

connectorUiConfig.title: Forescout Host Property Monitor
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown: The Forescout Host Property Monitor connector allows you to connect host/policy/compliance properties from Forescout platform with Microsoft Sentinel, to view, create custom incidents, and improve investigation. This gives you more insight into your organization network and improves your security operation capabilities.

dataTypes.name: ForescoutHostProperties_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
ForescoutHostProperties_CL
            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

dataTypes.name: ForescoutPolicyStatus_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
ForescoutPolicyStatus_CL
            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

dataTypes.name: ForescoutComplianceStatus_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
ForescoutComplianceStatus_CL
            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

value:
ForescoutHostProperties_CL
            | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
            | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(30d)

ForescoutPolicyStatus_CL
            | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
            | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(30d)

ForescoutComplianceStatus_CL
            | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
            | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(30d)

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: read and write permissions are required.

read permissions to shared keys for the workspace are required. [See the documentation to learn more about workspace keys](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/platform/agent-windows#obtain-workspace-id-and-key).

customs.name: Forescout Plugin requirement
customs.description: Please make sure Forescout Microsoft Sentinel plugin is running on Forescout platform

instructionSteps.description: Instructions on how to configure Forescout Microsoft Sentinel plugin are provided at Forescout Documentation Portal (https://docs.forescout.com/bundle/microsoft-sentinel-module-v2-0-0-h)

connectorUiConfig.title: Forescout Host Property Monitor
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown: The Forescout Host Property Monitor connector allows you to connect host/policy/compliance properties from Forescout platform with Microsoft Sentinel, to view, create custom incidents, and improve investigation. This gives you more insight into your organization network and improves your security operation capabilities.

dataTypes.name: ForescoutHostProperties_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
ForescoutHostProperties_CL
            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

dataTypes.name: ForescoutPolicyStatus_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
ForescoutPolicyStatus_CL
            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

dataTypes.name: ForescoutComplianceStatus_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
ForescoutComplianceStatus_CL
            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

value:
ForescoutHostProperties_CL
            | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
            | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(30d)

ForescoutPolicyStatus_CL
            | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
            | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(30d)

ForescoutComplianceStatus_CL
            | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
            | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(30d)

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: read and write permissions are required.

read permissions to shared keys for the workspace are required. [See the documentation to learn more about workspace keys](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/platform/agent-windows#obtain-workspace-id-and-key).

customs.name: Forescout Plugin requirement
customs.description: Please make sure Forescout Microsoft Sentinel plugin is running on Forescout platform

instructionSteps.description: Instructions on how to configure Forescout Microsoft Sentinel plugin are provided at Forescout Documentation Portal (https://docs.forescout.com/bundle/microsoft-sentinel-module-v2-0-0-h)

metadata.description: Gain insights into host properties in Forescout platform

| render table","size":0,"title":"Hosts","timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","exportedParameters":[{"fieldName":"Ipv4Addr","parameterName":"Ipv4Addr","parameterType":1},{"fieldName":"localIpv6Addr","parameterName":"Ipv6Addr","parameterType":1}],"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["{LogAnalyticsWorkspace}"],"gridSettings":{"sortBy":[{"itemKey":"Ipv4Addr","sortOrder":2}]},"sortBy":[{"itemKey":"Ipv4Addr","sortOrder":2}]},"customWidth":"50","name":"query - 22","styleSettings":{"showBorder":true}},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"//let localIpv6Addr = iff(isnotempty('{Ipv6Addr}'), '{Ipv6Addr}', "");
let isSet = isnotempty('{Ipv6Addr}');
//print isSet;
let localIpv6Addr = iff(isSet, '{Ipv6Addr}', '');
ForescoutHostProperties_CL | sort by TimeGenerated
| where isnotempty('{Ipv4Addr}') or isnotempty(localIpv6Addr)
| where isnotempty(Ipv4Addr) or isnotempty(Ipv6Addr)
| extend matchv4 = iff( isnotempty('{Ipv4Addr}'), iff ( Ipv4Addr == '{Ipv4Addr}', 'TRUE', 'FALSE'), 'FALSE')
| extend matchv6 = iff( isnotempty(localIpv6Addr), iff (isnotempty(Ipv6Addr), iff ( localIpv6Addr == Ipv6Addr, 'TRUE', 'FALSE'), 'FALSE'), 'FALSE')
| where (matchv4 == 'TRUE') or (matchv6 == 'TRUE')
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by Ipv4Addr, tostring(Ipv6Addr)
| project-away matchv4,matchv6
","size":0,"title":"Host Details for host: {Ipv4Addr}, {Ipv6Addr}","timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["{LogAnalyticsWorkspace}"]},"customWidth":"50","name":"query - 20","styleSettings":{"showBorder":true}}],"exportParameters":true},"name":"group - 17","styleSettings":{"showBorder":true}},{"type":12,"content":{"version":"NotebookGroup/1.0","groupType":"editable","title":"Policy Info","expandable":true,"items":[{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"ForescoutPolicyStatus_CL

| where isnotempty('{RuleName}')
| where isnotempty(PolicyName)
| where  tostring(split('{RuleName}', '/', 0)) contains PolicyName
| where isnotempty(PolicyName)
| where Status startswith "Match"
| extend hostID = strcat(Ipv4Addr, MacAddr)
| extend TimeGenerated = startofday(TimeGenerated)
| distinct hostID, TimeGenerated, tostring(RuleName)
| summarize count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d),RuleName | sort by count_
| render timechart","size":0,"aggregation":2,"title":"Device Distribution for Selected Policy over Time: {RuleName}","timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["{LogAnalyticsWorkspace}"]},"name":"query - 11","styleSettings":{"showBorder":true}}],"exportParameters":true},"name":"group - 10","styleSettings":{"showBorder":true}},{"type":12,"content":{"version":"NotebookGroup/1.0","groupType":"editable","title":"Vendors/Model/Function based Info","expandable":true,"items":[{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"ForescoutHostProperties_CL 
| where HostProperties has "VendorClassification"
| extend hostID = strcat(Ipv4Addr, MacAddr)
| extend prop = tostring(HostProperties.VendorClassification[0])
| distinct hostID, prop

| where HostProperties has "ModelClassification"
| extend hostID = strcat(Ipv4Addr, MacAddr)
| extend prop = tostring(HostProperties.ModelClassification[0])
| distinct hostID, prop
| summarize count() by prop
| sort by count_","size":0,"showAnalytics":true,"title":"Model Seen over last 30 days","timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","showRefreshButton":true,"exportFieldName":"x","exportParameterName":"Model","showExportToExcel":true,"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["{LogAnalyticsWorkspace}"],"visualization":"barchart","chartSettings":{"group":"prop","createOtherGroup":20}},"customWidth":"33","name":"query - 1 - Copy - Copy","styleSettings":{"showBorder":true}},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"ForescoutHostProperties_CL 
| where HostProperties has "FunctionClassification"
| extend hostID = strcat(Ipv4Addr, MacAddr)
| extend prop = tostring(HostProperties.FunctionClassification[0])
| distinct hostID, prop

| where HostProperties has "VendorClassification"
| where HostProperties.VendorClassification[0] contains '{Vendor}' or HostProperties.VendorClassification[1] contains '{Vendor}'
| extend IP_MAC = strcat(strcat(Ipv4Addr, "_"), MacAddr)
| extend Vendor = tostring(HostProperties.VendorClassification[0])
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IP_MAC, Vendor

| extend Function = tostring(HostProperties.FunctionClassification[0])
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IP_MAC, Function

| where isnotempty(OtVulnerabilities)
| extend Vuln = parse_json(OtVulnerabilities)
| mv-expand Vuln
| extend Vuln = trim_end("}" ,substring(Vuln, 1))
| distinct Ipv4Addr, MacAddr, Vuln
//| extend Vuln = split(Vuln, ", ")
| parse-kv Vuln as (vendor_specific_id: string, cvss_score: real, title: string, cve_id: string) with (pair_delimiter=', ', kv_delimiter='=')

properties.description: @{workbookKey=ForescoutHostPropertyWorkbook; logoFileName=forescout-logo.svg; description=Gain insights into host properties in Forescout platform; dataTypesDependencies=System.Object[]; dataConnectorsDependencies=System.Object[]; previewImagesFileNames=System.Object[]; version=1.0; title=Forescout Host Property Monitor Workbook; templateRelativePath=ForescoutHostPropertyMonitorWorkbook.json; subtitle=; provider=Forescout}.description

properties.descriptionHtml:
Note: Please refer to the following before installing the solution:

• Review the solution Release Notes

• There may be known issues pertaining to this Solution, please refer to them before installing.

Forescout Host Property Monitor offers host property analysis, incident generation and action dispatching for hosts managed by Forescout Continuum platform.

Data Connectors: 1, Workbooks: 1, Analytic Rules: 1, Playbooks: 1

Learn more about Microsoft Sentinel | Learn more about Solutions
